SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.config

Class Properties

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.config.ConfigFoundation
com.mimecast.robin.config.Properties
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Properties extends ConfigFoundation
General purpose configuration.

This provides access to a generic properties file.

It will also read primitives from system properties with priority.

See Also:
